author: Robert L.
title: Keep Schools Safe by Listening to the ‘Buzz’
text:
The best way to prevent school shootings may lie within the society of America’s young people. After the 1999 killings at Columbine, the Department of Education and the Secret Service investigated 37 targeted school shootings and school attacks from 1970 to 2000 to determine if there was a common profile. There wasn’t. What most of the perpetrators did have in common, though, was that they had told someone in their social network what they were going to do.

Last week a student attending Maryland’s Laurel High School told a...
